body: A rapist than a "chad"
This guy should kicked the chad in the balls until its destroyed. We the cops come he can say that he was stopping someones from raping his girlfriend. She confesses blackmail. GG
This needs a  part 2 it just feels incomplete. Other than that pretty meh story and a weak ntr .
what is NTR means?

@joulian - but it's not confirmed that she actually stayed with the scumbag tho. NTR isn't so much about the breaking of bonds but with also with the female partner leaving the cuck for someone else, usually for impure reasons. 

There's another Mashiraga manga where the girl breaks it off with the scumbag but purposely does not get back together with the bf even though he was willing. I wouldn't call that NTR either.

@knightsabre2k
It is NTR. They having sex in front of the boyfriend most likely broke the relationship because of lack of trust, which originally showed when she didn't tell him about her father. This counts as two separate failures rather than one.
She has daddy issues, and he can still manipulate her by threatening to disclose their location to her father. 
If she explains him her side, it's because he caught her and not because she wants to trust him. Also, she recognizes the pattern and acknowledges she can't break it.
Mashiraga's story!!! I hope this will be good like fork in the road..
I just want to fap with NTR, then came the plot : (

@knightsabre2k mashiraga tends to have more realistic ntr (plenty of dumb ones too though) but it's still final imo. Like fork in the road. The dude needed to gtfo after she got pregnant even if he did feel it was partially his fault (it kinda was but only ever so slightly) none of his ntr's have room for happy endings though some don't seem as doom and gloom as other artists ntrs
Girls with daddy issues are a real thing and very easy to manipulate
Truly what a Satan. Cucks is humanity greatest mistake.

Is this NTR tho? Doesn't seem like the girl has fallen yet & can still break away. That's the thing about Mashiraga Aki stories. They don't always end with the original lover being cucked but those endings are often worse than if it was pure NTR...
Uf this is sad that dude is a bastard NTR are sometimes entertaining to read
